sentences: Thulisile Phongolo (also Thuli P; born 22 January 1994) is an actress and disc jockey in South African media.
By September 2017, Phongolo was an amateur disc jockey, a profession she maintained through at least November 2019.
After leaving that show in 2018, Phongolo acted in SABC's TV series Makoti and Mzansi Magic's The Republic.
In November 2021, she was performing in The Wife: Showmax's telenovela adaptation of Dudu Busani-Dube's Hlomu: The Wife.
